params.token: Address of the token being staked in the gauge

params.amount: Amount of 'balance' debited from the Gauge and credited to the User
Amount of 'balance' debited from the User and credited to the Gauge

params.gaugeReward: Address of the newly set GaugeReward contract

params.amount: Amount of 'token' deposited into the GaugeController
params.user: Address of the user who deposited 'token' into the GaugeController

params.amount: Amount of 'token' withdrawn from the GaugeController
params.user: Address of the user who withdrew 'token' from the GaugeController

params._scale: Amount to scale new Gauge by

claimOwnership().details: This function is only callable by the `_pendingOwner`.

params._token: ERC20 contract address (used to weight gauges)

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be debited from the Gauge balance and credited to the Gauge balance
Amount of tokens to be deposited

params._endTime: Unix timestamp to signal END of the Binary search
params._startTime: Unix timestamp to signal START of the Binary search

returns._0: uint256 Gauge average staked balance between two timestamps.

params._endTime: Unix timestamp to signal END of the Binary search
params._startTime: Unix timestamp to signal START of the Binary search

returns._0: uint256 Gauge average scaled balance between two timestamps.

params._endTime: Unix timestamp to signal END of the Binary search
params._startTime: Unix timestamp to signal START of the Binary search

params._gauge: Address of the gauge to get stake balance for
params._user: Address of the user to get stake balance for

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be debited from the User balance and credited to the Gauge balance

isGauge(address).details: Only reliable to check if a Gauge has been created AND also staked on.Uses the TWAB balance to determine "isGauge" status.

returns._0: True if gauge is active. False otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._scale: Amount to scale existing Gauge by

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be withdrawn

balances.details: The balance is updated in deposit, withthdraw, gaugeIncrease and gaugeDecrease. ----------------------------- | Address     | Balance     | | ----------- | ----------- | | 0x111...111 | 0x1000      | | 0x222...222 | 0x100000    | -----------------------------

Deployed(address,address).notice: Event emitted when the contract is deployed

GaugeAdded(address,address).notice: Emitted when an Authorized User adds a new Gauge to the GaugeController

GaugeDecreased(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when User decrease a Gauge weight.

GaugeIncreased(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when User increases a Gauge weight.

GaugeRemoved(address,address).notice: Emitted when an Authorized User removes an existing Gauge from the GaugeController

GaugeRewardSet(address).notice: Emitted when GaugeReward address is set/updated

GaugeScaleSet(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when an Authorized User sets an existing Gauge 'scale' weight.

TokenDeposited(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when User deposits 'token' into the gauge.

TokenWithdrawn(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when User withdraws 'token' from the gauge.

addGauge(address).notice: Add new gauge with "1e18" scale to the GaugeController.

addGaugeWithScale(address,uint256).notice: Add new gauge and target scale to the GaugeController.

balances(address).notice: Tracks user balance. Balance is used to update target gauge weight balances.

claimOwnership().notice: Allows the `_pendingOwner` address to finalize the transfer.

decreaseGauge(address,uint256).notice: Decrease Gauge balance and increase User staked balance.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposit tokens in GaugeController and increase User balance.

getAverageGaugeBalanceBetween(address,ui.notice: Calculate Gauge average balance between two timestamps.

getAverageGaugeScaleBetween(address,uint.notice: Calculate Gauge average scale between two timestamps.

getScaledAverageGaugeBalanceBetween(addr.notice: Calculate Gauge weighted balance using Staked AND Scaled time-weighted average balances.

getUserGaugeBalance(address,address).notice: Get the user stake balance for a given gauge

increaseGauge(address,uint256).notice: Increase Gauge balance by decreasing User staked balance.

isGauge(address).notice: Checks gauge status by reading the TWAB balance

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

token().notice: ERC20 token contract address (used to weight gauges)

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows current owner to set the `_pendingOwner` address.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw tokens in GaugeController and increase User balance.
